definition: To resemble or be similar to something or someone else, often used to describe the comparison of two or more objects, people, or situations. It is commonly used to express similarities in appearance, characteristics, or qualities between different entities.

examples.english: The results are almost the same.

examples.german: Die beiden Br√ºder gleichen sich wie ein Ei dem anderen.
examples.english: The two brothers are as alike as two peas in a pod.

examples.german: Die Meinungen der Experten gleichen sich in diesem Punkt.
examples.english: The opinions of the experts coincide on this point.
